00049 class RegressionTest {
00050 
00051 public:
00052 
00054   RegressionTest(const std::string& name,
00055                  const std::string& generatedFile, 
00056                  const std::string& goldFile,
00057                  double epsilon, 
00058                  const std::string& command,
00059                  int rowSkip,
00060                  int colSkip,
00061                  bool matchNames,
00062                  int allowedMisMatch,
00063                  bool negTest = false)
00064   {
00065     m_Name = name;
00066     m_Checks.push_back(new MatrixCheck(generatedFile, goldFile, epsilon,
00067                                        rowSkip, colSkip, matchNames, allowedMisMatch));
00068     m_CommandStr = command;
00069     m_CommandStr = Util::convertPathName(m_CommandStr,false);
00070     m_Delete = true;
00071     m_NegTest = negTest;
00072   }
00073   
00074   RegressionTest(const std::string& name,
00075                  const std::string& command, 
00076                  const std::vector<RegressionCheck *>& fileChecks,
00077                  bool doDelete=true,
00078                  bool negTest = false)
00079   {
00080     m_Name = name;
00081     m_CommandStr = command;
00082     m_CommandStr = Util::convertPathName(m_CommandStr,false);
00083     m_Checks = fileChecks;
00084     m_Delete = doDelete;
00085     m_NegTest = negTest;
00086   }
00087 
00088   ~RegressionTest() {
00089     if (m_Delete) {
00090       for(uint32_t i = 0; i < m_Checks.size(); i++) {
00091         delete m_Checks[i];
00092       }
00093     }
00094   }
00095   
00100   bool run() {
00101     bool success = true;
00102     assert(m_CommandStr != "");
00103 
00104     time_t startTime = time(NULL);
00105     int retVal = system(m_CommandStr.c_str());
00106     time_t endTime = time(NULL);
00107     m_RunTime = endTime - startTime; // convert to ms
00108     if(retVal == -1) {
00109       m_Error += ToStr(" Failed to run command: ") + m_CommandStr;
00110       success = false;
00111     }
00112     if(retVal != 0) {
00113       m_Error += ToStr(" Command exited with non-zero status: ") + m_CommandStr;
00114       success = false;
00115     }
00116     return success;
00117   }
00118 
00123   bool pass() {
00124     bool success = true;
00125     std::string xmlFile = "JUnitTestResults." + m_Name + ".xml";
00126     std::ofstream xmlOut;
00127     std::vector<std::string> m_Results(m_Checks.size() + 1);
00128 
00129     if(Util::fileExists(xmlFile))
00130         Util::fileRemove(xmlFile);
00131 
00132     int numFailed = 0;
00133     int numSkipped = 0;
00134     int numPassed = 0;
00135 
00136     if(run()) {
00137       numPassed++;
00138       m_Results[0] = "  <testcase classname=\"" + m_Name + "\" name=\""+ m_Name +".run\" time=\""+ToStr(m_RunTime)+"\"/>\n";
00139       for(unsigned int i = 0; i < m_Checks.size(); i++) {
00140         std::string msg;
00141         bool currentPass;
00142         try {
00143             currentPass = m_Checks[i]->check(msg);
00144             if(m_Checks[i]->m_NegTest) {
00145                 currentPass = !currentPass;
00146                 msg = "test passed, but was not expected to pass";
00147             }
00148         } 
00149         catch(...) {
00150             currentPass = false;
00151             msg = "unexpected exception thrown";
00152         }
00153         if(!currentPass) {
00154           m_Error += msg;
00155           success = false;
00156           numFailed++;
00157           m_Results[i+1] = 
00158                      "  <testcase classname=\"" + m_Name + "\" name=\""+ m_Name + "." + m_Checks[i]->m_Name +"\">\n" +
00159                      "      <error message=\"check failed\">\n" + msg +
00160                      "      </error>\n" +
00161                      "  </testcase>\n";
00162         } else {
00163           numPassed++;
00164           m_Results[i+1] = "  <testcase classname=\"" + m_Name + "\" name=\""+ m_Name + "." + m_Checks[i]->m_Name +"\"/>\n";
00165         }
00166       }
00167     }
00168     /* failed just running the test. */
00169     else {
00170       std::string reportMsg;
00171       numSkipped = m_Checks.size();
00172       if(m_NegTest) {
00173         numFailed = 0;
00174         numPassed = 1;
00175         reportMsg = "test skipped because of expected execution failure -- this test should probably not exist";
00176         success = true;
00177         m_Results[0] = "  <testcase classname=\"" + m_Name + "\" name=\""+ m_Name +".run\"/>\n";
00178       } else {
00179         numFailed = 1;
00180         numPassed = 0;
00181         reportMsg = "test skipped because of unexpected execution failure";
00182         success = false;
00183         m_Results[0] = "  <testcase classname=\"" + m_Name + "\" name=\""+ m_Name +".run\">\n" +
00184                      "      <error message=\"execution failed\">\n" + m_Error + "\n" +
00185                      "      </error>\n" +
00186                      "  </testcase>\n";
00187       }
00188       for(int i = 0; i < m_Checks.size(); i++) {
00189           m_Results[i+1] = 
00190                      "  <testcase classname=\"" + m_Name + "\" name=\""+ m_Name + "." + m_Checks[i]->m_Name +"\">\n" +
00191                      "      <skipped message=\"" + reportMsg + "\"/>\n" + 
00192                      "  </testcase>\n";
00193       }
00194 
00195     }
00196 
00197     // Generate xml Junit file
00198     xmlOut.open(xmlFile.c_str());
00199     xmlOut << "<?xml version=\"1.0\"?>\n";
00200     xmlOut << "<testsuite errors=\"0\" skipped=\"" + ToStr(numSkipped) + "\" failures=\"" + ToStr(numFailed) + "\" tests=\"" + ToStr(m_Checks.size() + 1) + "\" name=\"" + m_Name + "\">\n";
00201     for(int i=0; i< m_Results.size(); i++)
00202         xmlOut << m_Results[i];
00203     xmlOut << "</testsuite>\n";
00204     xmlOut.close();
00205 
00206     return success;
00207   }

00216   std::string getErrorMsg() { return m_Error; }
00217 
00227   static bool syncDirectory(const char *targetName, const char *localName, 
00228                             const char *hostUrl, std::string &errorMsg) {
00229     std::string targetPath(targetName);
00230     std::string localPath(localName);
00231     targetPath = Util::convertPathName(targetPath);
00232     localPath = Util::convertPathName(localPath);
00233 #if defined (WIN32)
00234     errorMsg = "Please copy data in" + targetPath + " to " + localPath;
00235     return false;
00236 #else
00237     /* On unix, if possible try to just link the data as this is quick. */
00238     if(Util::directoryReadable(targetPath)) {
00239       int retVal = 0;
00240       std::string command = ToStr("ln -s ") + targetPath + "  " + localPath;
00241       retVal = system(command.c_str());
00242       if(retVal == 0) {
00243         return true;
00244       }
00245       else {
00246         errorMsg = "Failed trying to run command: " + command;
00247         return false;
00248       }
00249     }
00250     /* Can't see that directory, try to download it. */
00251     else {
00252       std::string command = ToStr("wget -m -P ") + localPath  + 
00253         " " + ToStr(hostUrl);
00254       int retVal = 0;
00255       Verbose::out(1, "Retrieving remote data using wget.", false);
00256       retVal = system(command.c_str());
00257       Verbose::out(1, "\tDone.");
00258       if(retVal == 0) {
00259         return true;
00260       }
00261       else {
00262         errorMsg = "Failed trying to run command: " + command;
00263       }
00264     }
00265 #endif
00266     return false;
00267   }
00268 
00269 public:
00270   std::string m_Name;
00271   bool m_NegTest;
00272 
00273 private:
00274   RegressionTest() {}
00275   std::vector<RegressionCheck *> m_Checks;
00276   std::string m_CommandStr;     
00277   std::string m_Error;          
00278   bool m_Delete;
00279   int64_t m_RunTime;
00280 };
